MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:50pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:56pm on Saturday, 31 October 2020
